attributes.action: Require New Drivers To Resit The Test If They have An Accident!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am acquainted with a young driver who has written off two cars in his first year of driving! At least one of the accidents was his fault. I think ALL drivers should have to resit their test if they have an accident within their first two years on the road!
